title: How to Fix Hot and Sticky Bed Sheets

steps.headline: Hop out of the bed.
steps.description: Have anyone else sharing the bed hop out too unless they're keen to be sprinkled.

steps.headline: Sprinkle cornflour or baby powder across the bottom sheet.
Lay the top sheet back over.
steps.description: Rub the sheets together a little to help distribute the powder.

steps.headline: Hop back into bed.
steps.description: The sheets will suddenly feel both cooler and smoother. Happy sleeping!
